settings.subheading_1:
For the first time, our new Generation 8 combines the full performance of classic e-bikes with the low weight of light-assist bikes. Riders enjoy unlimited comfort, ergonomics and functionality, and most of all the nimble feeling made possible by the lowered overall weight.


Our new Generation 8 sets a new standard for e-bikes. Awarded the Eurobike Award 2025.
settings.subheading_1_de:
Die neue Generation 8 verbindet erstmals
die volle Leistung klassischer E-Bikes mit dem geringen Gewicht von Light-Assist-Bikes. Die Fahrer genießen dabei uneingeschränkten Komfort, Ergonomie und Funktionalität, trotz des geringeren Gewichts.


Damit setzt unsere neue Generation 8 einen neuen Standard für E-Bikes. Ausgezeichnet mit dem Eurobike Award 2025.
settings.subheading_1_fr:
Pour la première fois, la nouvelle génération 8 combine toutes les performances des vélos électriques classiques avec le faible poids des vélos à assistance légère. Les conducteurs bénéficient d’un confort, d’une ergonomie et d’une fonctionnalité illimités, malgré un poids réduit.


Notre nouvelle génération 8 établit ainsi une nouvelle norme pour les vélos électriques. Récompensés par l’Eurobike Award 2025.

settings.description: Our multi-award-winning success models – made for leisure tours and everyday life.
settings.description_de: Unsere mehrfach ausgezeichneten Erfolgsmodelle – gemacht für Touren in Freizeit und Alltag.
settings.description_fr: Nos modèles à succès plusieurs fois primés – conçus pour les randonnées de loisirs et de la vie quotidienne.

settings.description: Practical, reliable and stylish – the City series is made for everyday life in and out of the city.
settings.description_de: Praktisch, zuverlässig und stylisch – die City-Serie für den Alltag in und außerhalb der Stadt.
settings.description_fr: Pratique, fiable et élégante – la série City pour la vie quotidienne en ville et en dehors.

settings.description: The new series of lightweight and powerful e-bikes, suitable for everyday riding, commuting and leisure.
settings.description_de: Die neue Serie leichter, kraftvoller und alltagstauglicher E-Bikes. Speziell gemacht für die Stadt.
settings.description_fr: La nouvelle série de vélos électriques légers, puissants et quotidiens – conçus pour la ville.

custom_css: @media (max-width: 768px) {.Bikebanner-image {width: 400px; object-fit: contain; } .Bikebanner {flex-direction: column !important; } .Bikebanner-content p {display: block; width: 100% !important; font-size: 14px; } .Bikebanner-image img {width: 90%; object-fit: contain; }}
custom_bikeslideshow_3yLpTR.name: Bike Slideshow

settings.text:
Despite numerous adjustment options available, many riders do not take advantage of the ergonomic possibilities of their e-bikes.


The new ErgoAdjust system changes that:
All ergonomically relevant contact points of our HEPHA e-bikes are now equipped with numbered scales. This ensures that all settings - from our own or external consulting systems - can be reliably transferred to the e-bike.

In the HEPHA app, the user can enter central body data and determine his desired sitting position. The system provides suggestions with setting values that can be easily transferred to the e-bike with the help of the scales.

settings.title: Immobilizer
settings.text: The 2Lock immobilizer is integrated directly into the hub and locks it together with the axle. A locking bolt that is inaccessible from outside makes the lock 100% burglar-proof. Attempting to escape on the bike or to resell it is therefore almost impossible.

settings.title: Alarm
settings.text: Thief deterrent: The new alarm attracts maximum attention with a loud human voice.

settings.title: Watch-Mode
settings.text: Stolen bikes are often difficult to recognize – until now. The new Watch Mode permanently marks the bike as stolen in the event of theft, making it extremely unattractive for resale. At the same time, the mode blocks all drive components from operating, making the bike unusable for the thieves.

settings.title: Replacement-Service
settings.text: If a theft of a bike equipped with the “ATS” is nevertheless successful, the optional HEPHA Replacement Service takes effect: The service can be booked with a one-time fee of €149 when buying a bike – and it protects the e-bike for three years. In an emergency, the stolen bike will be replaced, hassle-free.

With „ISTOS“ we present a new brand for components and accessories - developed especially for HEPHA. The new name „ISTOS“ is derived from the second part of our namesake „HEPHAISTOS“. As it is well-known, the bike and it´s accessory brand form a unit. This is exactly what we claim: a well-thought-out overall system from a single source.

settings.title: E-Dropper for Retrofitting
settings.text: Share blog posts, products, or promotions with your customers. Use this text to describe products, share details on availability andComfort at the touch of a button: The new electronic dropper seatpost can be seamlessly integrated into the system. The dropper does not require time-consuming cable routings or additional levers and is conveniently controlled remotely. All MY26 bikes are fully pre-wired from the factory. style, or as a space to display recent reviews or FAQs.

settings.title: FlexCarrier for Generation 8
settings.text: With the FlexCarrier, we offer a robust, modular MIK-HD luggage rack, that flexibly adapts to different customer needs. It can optionally be equipped with a separately available spring flap that can be mounted on both sides – as well as retaining rails for panniers.

settings.title: E-Dropper for Retrofitting
settings.title_fr: E-dropper pour la mise à niveau
settings.description: Comfort at the touch of a button: The new electronic dropper seatpost can be seamlessly integrated into the system. The dropper does not require time-consuming cable routings or additional levers and is conveniently controlled remotely. All MY26 bikes are fully pre-wired from the factory.
settings.description_de: Komfort auf Knopfdruck: Die neue elektronische Sattelstütze lässt sich nahtlos ins System integrieren und bequem per Remote steuern – ganz ohne zusätzlichen Hebel oder aufwendige Kabelverlegung. Alle MY26-Bikes sind bereits ab Werk vollständig vorverkabelt.
settings.description_fr: Le confort sur simple pression d’un bouton : la nouvelle tige de selle électronique peut être intégrée sans problème dans le système et commandée confortablement à distance, sans levier supplémentaire ni acheminement fastidieux des câbles. Tous les vélos MY26 sont entièrement pré-câblés en usine.

settings.title: FlexCarrier for Generation 8
settings.description: With the FlexCarrier, we offer a robust, modular MIK-HD luggage rack, that flexibly adapts to different customer needs. It can optionally be equipped with a separately available spring flap that can be mounted on both sides – as well as retaining rails for panniers.
settings.description_de: Mit dem FlexCarrier bieten wir einen robusten, modularen MIK-HD-Gepäckträger, der sich flexibel an unterschiedliche Kundenbedürfnisse anpasst. Er lässt sich wahlweise mit einer separat erhältlichen Federklappe ausstatten, die beidseitig montierbar ist – ebenso wie Halteschienen für Gepäcktaschen.
settings.description_fr: Avec le FlexCarrier, nous proposons un porte-bagages MIK-HD robuste et modulaire qui s’adapte de manière flexible aux différents besoins des clients. Il peut être équipé en option d’un rabat à ressort disponible séparément qui peut être monté des deux côtés, ainsi que de rails de retenue pour les sacoches.

settings.title: Range Duplicator up to 1.200 Wh
settings.description: With the new HEPHA Range Duplicator, the battery capacity can be doubled to a whopping 1,200 Wh. At its core, it is a second battery – available at an attractive MSRP of € 499.
settings.description_de: Mit dem neuen HEPHA Range Duplicator lässt sich die Akkukapazität auf satte 1.200 Wh verdoppeln. Im Kern handelt es sich um einen zweiten Akku – erhältlich zum attraktiven UVP von 499 €.
settings.description_fr: Avec le nouveau douplicator de portée HEPHA, la capacité de la batterie peut être doublée pour atteindre 1 200 Wh. Il s’agit essentiellement d’une deuxième batterie, disponible au prix de vente conseillé de 499 €.

settings.title: HEPHA P101C
settings.description: In the future, the model range will be starting from 100Nm versions – the variants with 80 and 90Nm from prior generations will be dropped out of the lineup.
settings.description_de: Künftig starten alle Modelle bei 100Nm – die Varianten mit 80 und 90Nm entfallen.
settings.description_fr: À l’avenir, tous les modèles commenceront à 100 Nm – les variantes avec 80 et 90 Nm seront abandonnées.

settings.title: HEPHA P110
settings.description: Our successful P101C engine is getting a reinforcement: the new HEPHA P110. With 110Nm of maximum torque and 800W of peak power, it steps up our drive line one more level.
settings.description_de: Unser erfolgreicher P101C-Motor bekommt Verstärkung: den neuen HEPHA P110. Mit 110Nm Drehmoment und bis zu 800W maximaler Leistung erweitert er unsere Antriebslinie nach oben.
settings.description_fr: Notre moteur P101C à succès est renforcé : le nouveau HEPHA P110. Avec un couple de 110 Nm et une puissance maximale allant jusqu’à 800 W, il étend notre gamme de motorisation vers le haut.
